name: WAT!?
description:
Try to get to the top of the map while expiriencing a lot of bugs. On your journey you will ask yourself a lot of questions like: "WAT am I doing with my life?"

Once you start there is no way out (There is no quit button).

If you get to the end please tell me what happens.

CONTROLS:

W - jump

S - crouch

D - move right

A - move left

Left mouse button - left hand grab

Right mouse button - right hand grab

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

1. Download

2. Unzip

3. And open the .exe file

(easy)
